AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_002.synopsis: The goblins friend died, but being a goblin, she doesn't really care. It's a normal occurence.

AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_001.synopsis: This very drunk goblin saw his friend die.

AD_CryingOverBody.synopsis: Goblin crying over the body of the goblin she loved.

AD_Stories.synopsis: Crusher is boasting about the time he captured someone.

AD_LeftFight_Breg.synopsis: Drunk goblin running away from a fight. He slurs a little.

AD_PlayerKissedFoot_001.synopsis: The drunk goblin is laughing at you because you kissed another goblin's foot.

AD_KissedFootComment_001.synopsis: One of Crusher's friends comments on him kissing the player's foot.

AD_PlayerKissedFoot_002.synopsis: Goblin laughing at the player for kissing another goblin's foot.

AD_KissedFootComment_002.synopsis: One of Crusher's friends comments on him kissing the player's foot.

AD_LeftFight_Kirz.synopsis: Goblin running away from a fight.

AD_SecludedPlace.synopsis: Said when the goblin has moved away from his friends and the festivities to brood in a secluded place.

AD_MovingAway.synopsis: Crusher excuses himself to go take a piss.

AD_LeftFight_Tiny.synopsis: Goblin running away from a fight.

AD_FistFight.synopsis: A goblin got into a (friendly) fight with the player. The other goblins are cheering him on. The fight is happening a little farther away, so they are shouting.

AD_DefeatComment_002.synopsis: One of the Crusher's really drunk friends comments on seeing Crusher being beaten by the player.

AD_DefeatComment_001.synopsis: One of the dwarf operators comments on seeing Crusher being beaten by the player.

AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_002_0.speaker: Brawler Tiny
AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_002_0.text: Let's go. He'll start stinking soon.
AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_002_0.context: NodeContext: She's very callous, and maybe a bit scared that what killed Crusher might kill her too.

AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_001_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_PlayerKilledDrunkGoblin_001_0.context: NodeContext: He's still very drunk and doesn't really realise what's going on.

AD_CryingOverBody_0.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_CryingOverBody_0.context: NodeContext: She doesn't understand how Crusher could die because he's one of the strongest goblins.

AD_CryingOverBody_1.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_CryingOverBody_1.context: NodeContext: She doesn't understand how Crusher could die because he's one of the strongest goblins.

AD_CryingOverBody_2.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_CryingOverBody_2.context: NodeContext: She's devastated because the goblin she loved died.

AD_CryingOverBody_3.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_CryingOverBody_3.context: NodeContext: She's devastated because the goblin she loved died.

AD_Stories_21.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_21.text: So I'm shootin' arrows at this dwarf. It's great.
AD_Stories_21.context: NodeContext: boasting. He's retelling a tale.

AD_Stories_15.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_15.text: Then this other guy twirls his fingers, an' some light comes out.

AD_Stories_18.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_18.text: And the dwarf just... stops bleeding. Just stands back up.
AD_Stories_18.context: NodeContext: He's retelling a tale and boasting about the foe he's defeating.

AD_Stories_26.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_Stories_26.context: NodeContext: slightly in awe. Booyagh means magic. (pronounced BOO-yahg with a hard g)

AD_Stories_16.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_16.text: Yeah. They got some cheatin' magicker.
AD_Stories_16.context: NodeContext: He's a bit disgusted, feels like it was unfair.

AD_Stories_1.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_1.context: NodeContext: retelling his tale, trying to build tension.

AD_Stories_11.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_11.text: 'Cuz I ain't wasting arrows, not me.

AD_Stories_4.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_Stories_4.context: NodeContext: She's listening to Crusher's story and thinks everything he says is amazing. She's in awe.

AD_Stories_5.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_5.text: An' I run up to the guy an' think, 'Try healin' this'.

AD_Stories_3.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_Stories_3.context: NodeContext: excited, a bit in awe.

AD_Stories_6.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_6.text: Figured I'd give him to the drow. Keep the Absolute happy.

AD_Stories_8.speaker: Brawler Tiny
AD_Stories_8.context: NodeContext: small laugh. Is imagining someone else's misfortune.

AD_Stories_7.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_7.text: Then 'e turns. Must've... must've read my mind, y'know?

AD_Stories_25.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_25.text: And 'e raises his arm to magick again.

AD_Stories_20.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_20.text: So I grab 'is hand, and crush it. Crack.

AD_Stories_12.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_12.text: Then 'e lifts up this mace. With his other arm.
AD_Stories_12.context: NodeContext: He's retelling a tale. exasparated.

AD_Stories_0.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_0.text: So I stuck my dagger in that arm.

AD_Stories_24.speaker: Crusher
AD_Stories_24.text: No more problems from that runt after that.
AD_Stories_24.context: NodeContext: satisfied. The tale is done.

AD_FriendsAtFestivities_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_FriendsAtFestivities_0.context: NodeContext: He is too drunk to speak normally

AD_FriendsAtFestivities_1.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_FriendsAtFestivities_1.text: I wonder if Crusher's all right?

AD_LeftFight_Breg_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_LeftFight_Breg_0.context: NodeContext: a little surprised that you actually hurt him.

AD_PlayerKissedFoot_001_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_PlayerKissedFoot_001_0.text: Hah! Didya really... really kiss his foot?
AD_PlayerKissedFoot_001_0.context: NodeContext: Laughing while he talks. He's very drunk.

AD_KissedFootComment_001_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_KissedFootComment_001_0.text: Ewww! Crusher - Crusher just licked some toes!
AD_KissedFootComment_001_0.context: NodeContext: The goblin is very drunk and finds this all very funny. deliver it laughing.

AD_PlayerKissedFoot_002_0.speaker: Brawler Tiny
AD_PlayerKissedFoot_002_0.context: NodeContext: The goblin is disgusted, but also thinks it's kind of funny.

AD_KissedFootComment_002_0.speaker: Tracker Kirz
AD_KissedFootComment_002_0.context: NodeContext: The goblin is surprised because her crush just licked the player's feet. (and she's jealous)

AD_SecludedPlace_0.speaker: Crusher
AD_SecludedPlace_0.text: Can't even enjoy a drink in peace.
AD_SecludedPlace_0.context: NodeContext: Grumbling to himself, staring at his reflection in the water

AD_MovingAway_2.speaker: Crusher
AD_MovingAway_2.text: Crazy, deranged... monsters... shouldn't be allowed in 'ere.
AD_MovingAway_2.context: NodeContext: Muttering to himself. He's pissed off.

AD_MovingAway_3.speaker: Crusher
AD_MovingAway_3.context: NodeContext: annoyed - he's lost his train of thought.

AD_MovingAway_0.speaker: Crusher
AD_MovingAway_0.text: They just had to talk to me.
AD_MovingAway_0.context: NodeContext: Muttering to himself. He's pissed off.

AD_MovingAway_1.speaker: Crusher
AD_MovingAway_1.context: NodeContext: Muttering to himself. He's pissed off.

AD_FriendsAtFestivities_OnlyTwo_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_FriendsAtFestivities_OnlyTwo_0.context: NodeContext: He is too drunk to speak normally

AD_DefeatComment_002_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_DefeatComment_002_0.context: NodeContext: The player just beat one of the strongest goblins, and this goblin is in Awe.

AD_DefeatComment_002_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
AD_DefeatComment_002_1.context: NodeContext: The player just beat one of the strongest goblins, and this goblin is in Awe.

AD_DefeatComment_001_0.speaker: Tracker Grikka
AD_DefeatComment_001_0.text: Didya see? Someone kicked Crusher's arse! Crusher!
AD_DefeatComment_001_0.context: NodeContext: The player just beat up one of the strongest goblins in the camp, and this goblin is in Awe.
